description:
Make getting around easier with Bolt! Whether you need a ride across town, an airport transfer, or a scooter to zip through traffic, our app makes it easy to move around confidently and conveniently.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT?
- Request a ride in seconds: enjoy safe, affordable rides with top-rated drivers.
- Transparent pricing: see your fare upfront so there are no surprises.
- Multiple payment options: pay securely using a credit/debit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or cash.

EASY ORDERING:
- Open the app and set your destination.
- Choose from various ride types to suit your needs (Comfort, Premium, Electric, XL, and more).
- Track your driver in real time.
- Arrive in comfort and rate your experience.

SAFETY FIRST:
Some of Bolt’s safety features require the app to run in the background.

- Emergency assist button: discreetly alert our Safety Team in case of emergencies.
- Audio trip recording: record audio during rides for added peace of mind.
- Private phone details: your contact information stays confidential when you call a driver.

PLAN AHEAD:
Need an airport transfer or an early morning ride? You can schedule your trip in advance from 30 minutes to 90 days before your expected pickup time.

*JOIN BOLT PLUS TO UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES!
Get the best of Bolt with Bolt Plus. Enjoy exclusive perks that save you time and money, making every ride smoother and more convenient.

*BOLT DRIVE:
We're committed to our carbon net zero goal by 2040. That's why we're increasing the lineup of electric and hybrid cars in Bolt Drive, our car-sharing service. You can also rent Bolt scooters and e-bikes via the app.

*DELIVER PACKAGES
Use the 'Send' ride type to arrange fast and convenient parcel delivery in your city.

Bolt is available in 50 countries and 600+ cities worldwide (see the full list at https://bolt.eu/en/cities/). We rebranded from Taxify to Bolt in 2019.

Bolt is the perfect taxi alternative for fast, reliable, and affordable rides. The app provides a seamless ride-ordering experience whether you’re commuting, travelling, or running errands. So, the next time you need a ride, choose Bolt!

*Bolt options differ by location. Check the app for availability in your city.

Earn money driving with the Bolt Driver app. Sign up: https://bolt.eu/driver/

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts, and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/Bolt/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt
X — https://x.com/Boltapp

Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you’re running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable, whether you're requesting a taxi for a trip or arranging a train journey.

Pick from a wide range of travel options that the Uber app has to offer including:
UberX: Affordable, everyday rides
Lux: Luxury cars with top-rated drivers for premium travel experiences
Electric: Sustainable rides in electric vehicles for eco-friendly trips
UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6, perfect for family trips
Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom to enhance your travel
Uber Pet: Ride with your pet
Reserve: Choose your exact pickup time up to 90 days in advance for planned trips
Exec: High-end cars with top-rated drivers, ideal for business travel
2-wheels: You can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app. Find a scooter to start riding today for quick trips
Assist: Special assistance from trained drivers for accessible travel
Access: Wheelchair accessible vehicles ensuring inclusivity in travel
Black Cab: travel with the iconic London taxi

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival, whether it's a taxi ride or train. 

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable in their travel and on trips.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We’re doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
Split Fare: Don’t worry about doing the math later—split the cost evenly while you’re still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from £0 Delivery Fee and up to 5% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 5-10% off eligible rides, and £5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. Extra wait time included to meet your ride. Cancel at no charge up to 60 minutes in advance.

TRAVEL
Get train, coach, and flight ticketing right on the Uber app. Get 10% back in Uber Credits and collect Avios when you book train, coach, and Eurostar trips. No booking fee. Make any flight flexible and refundable and avoid flight travel stress with flight disruption protection.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. Get great prices & selection from the best rental companies.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favourite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience, and pet supplies, and get them all delivered.
Uber Boat: Get fast, reliable river boat services in London. For commuters and visitors. Routes run from 24 piers across the capital.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber is available in the following cities: London, Manchester, Leeds, Glasgow, and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed.

The VR Matkalla app is a travel companion that can help you at every stage of your journey. 


START TRAVELLING

The VR Matkalla app is the best way to buy tickets for VR’s commuter and long-distance trains. The app offers single tickets, multi-tickets, and season tickets for regular travellers. Starting or continuing your journey in the capital region is easy! You can buy a handy HSL single ticket for your journey.

We will send your ticket to both the app and your email. You can pay for your journey using online banking, a payment card, MobilePay, Siirto or Epassi. If you have bought your tickets as a logged-in customer, you can always find the tickets you have bought in the app. This means that you can buy your ticket on your computer at home and still travel with that same ticket on your phone.

WHERE WOULD YOU LIKE TO SIT?

You can conveniently reserve a seat using the coach map when buying a ticket. You can also buy the seat next to you and enjoy the extra space. If you want to add a touch of luxury to your journey, you can travel in Ekstra Class or the restaurant car’s upstairs section, which offers the best view. You can also buy a ticket for your travel companion, bicycle, or pet.

PLANS CAN CHANGE

Sometimes things don’t go as planned. In the VR Matkalla app, you can also make changes after buying the ticket. You can easily change your seat and departure time yourself. If needed, the change can be made to the tickets of the whole travel party. If you’ve bought cancellation insurance, you can also cancel your journey in the app for free if plans change.

WHERE ARE WE AT?

With the VR Matkalla app, you will get real-time updates about your journey, so you will always know what is happening. You will be informed about things like your train’s departure, the movement of the train, changed timetables, transfers, and your train’s arrival. You can also view your train’s services and accessibility information in the app. If we have to cancel your train journey, we will suggest new journeys in the app for you to choose from.

YOU WILL ALWAYS KNOW YOUR BENEFITS

For those who download the app, we offer tasty benefits that you can use in the train’s restaurant car. In addition, we will also tell you about changing benefits that will make your journey even better. You can find our tips and benefits in the Messages section of the VR Matkalla app.

We continuously develop our app. You can now also check the carbon footprint of the journeys you’ve taken in the past 12 months. Did you know that the carbon dioxide emissions of a train are 98% lower than those of a car?

With Aimo in your pocket, you are ready to park with Aimo Park and charge with Aimo Charge in multi-storey and outdoor car parks in both big cities and smaller places.

App features:

- Find a parking space and EV-Charger with ease using the search and map function.
- Start your parking or charging session in just a few taps.
- Get reminders and extend your session using the app, from wherever you are.
- Pay by card or Swish and get a receipt directly in the app or via email.
- Corporate account for smoother administration of parking and charging with us.
- Change registration number on your parking subscription.
- Purchase some of our parking subscriptions.





How to get started with the app:


1. Download Aimo and create an account.
2. Add the payment method you want to use.
3. Select a parking zone, registration number and time.
4. Start your parking session.




The zone code makes sure you have the right location and allows our parking attendants to verify that you have paid for your parking session using their handheld computers. 
You manage your own parking session entirely via your phone, without needing to go to a machine or put a ticket in your windscreen.



Price: The app is free to download. When you pay for your parking via the app, a service fee is added, which can vary between cities and facilities. In the app, you see the total cost (parking fee plus service fee) before starting your parking.




Do you need help using the app? Go to www.aimoapp.se




Welcome to Aimo!

FEATURES THAT MAKE YOU HAPPY 
The Sokos Hotels app is the latest utility app from the S Group. With it, you can easily and conveniently: 

* book hotel nights in all Sokos Hotels, 
* check in to the hotel while on your way there, 
* see when your room is ready, 
* access your room with a mobile key without queuing,
* pick up extra keys from the self-service kiosk, and 
* view important information related to your stay. 

And more features creating happiness are coming! 

VALUABLE BENEFITS FOR YOUR LEISURE AND BUSINESS TRIPS
With the app, you can book nights and view your accommodation reservations in Finland and Tallinn.

At the same time, you can accumulate valuable benefits: as a co-op member of the S Group, you earn Bonus from your leisure trips, and as an S-Card loyalty customer, you earn S-points from your business trips.

Read more about co-op member benefits: https://www.sokoshotels.fi/asiakasomistajan-edut

See all S-Card loyalty benefits: https://www.sokoshotels.fi/scard

DO YOU ALREADY HAVE AN S USER ACCOUNT?
You log in to the service with an S User account. If you don’t have one yet, you can easily and quickly create it using the instructions in the app.

EasyPark has been making cities more livable since 2001. With millions of drivers, businesses, and operators using our services in more than 20 countries, we continue to develop convenient, easy-to-use solutions to save you time, and money and remove the unnecessary stress of car parking.

EasyPark is the nr. 1 parking app in Europe when it comes to coverage. With our mobile parking solution, you can pay for parking in a garage or find a parking spot in the street, in the city center or in the airport, at home or abroad - wherever life takes you! You can also charge your EV, and go even further.

Price: In most locations, we charge a service fee on top of the parking cost the operator charges. The total price and fee breakdown are shown in the EasyPark app when you set your end time and before you start to park, as well as in your parking receipt when the session has ended, so you are confident about how much you’re paying. Please see your local easypark.com site for more details.

With the EasyPark app, you can:
- Start your session from your mobile phone.
- Stop your session at any time, paying for the active time.
- Remotely extend your session if you need more time.
- Find parking near your location or destination before traveling.
- Charge your electric car with the same app.
- Pay for parking, whether privately or for work.
- Split your private and work-related parking or charging costs.
- Pay with secure methods such as Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay, or monthly invoices for business accounts.
- Get notified when your parking is close to expiration.

You can pay for parking and EV charging with the EasyPark app in: Rome, Madrid, Melbourne, Berlin, Copenhagen, Paris, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki and so many more!

Please note that the EasyPark app is unavailable in the United Kingdom. To park in the UK, please use the RingGo app instead.

Buses, trains, the Metro, trams and ferry – all in one app.  The HSL app allows you to buy public transport tickets for the Helsinki region, find the best routes using the Journey Planner, view all timetables, and receive personalized transport information.

You can buy single, day and season tickets for both adults and children via the HSL app. Adult multi-journey tickets and discounted tickets for students and passengers aged 70 and over are also available via the app. You can pay using the most popular payment methods, including debit/credit cards, MobilePay, phone bill and commuter benefits.

The HSL app's Journey Planner helps you find routes and informs you about the ticket needed for your journey. You can view real-time stop-specific departure and arrival times and track vehicles in real time. The app also displays any service changes and disruptions, and you can choose to receive notifications about these updates directly on your phone.

More information about Helsinki region public transport: hsl.fi

AIRBNB MORE THAN AN AIRBNB
The world is endlessly interesting and with Airbnb, you can explore it in more ways than ever. Find remarkable homes, unforgettable experiences and incredible services all in one app. Get inspired, book and go.

BOOK A HOME AND GO WHERE HOTELS CAN’T
Explore 8+ million holiday rentals in 240+ countries and regions to find the perfect stay for every kind of trip, whether you’re travelling alone or with a group. Use over 80 filtering options to find the amenities you want, like a pool, a kitchen or accessibility features like step-free entry. View all the details of a place at a glance on the listing page and check out the ratings and reviews to see what other guests who’ve stayed there think about it too.

DON’T JUST SEE A PLACE, EXPERIENCE IT
Find thousands of experiences around the world, hosted by locals who know their city best – all vetted for quality based on a host’s expertise, reputation and authenticity. Uncover unique perspectives on landmarks and museums. Get a taste of local cuisine through cooking classes and food tours. Enjoy the great outdoors, an art workshop, a live performance and much more. Plus, check out Airbnb Originals – extraordinary experiences hosted by the world’s most interesting people, designed exclusively for Airbnb.

MAKE YOUR STAY EVEN MORE SPECIAL WITH INCREDIBLE SERVICES
Make the most of your stay by booking incredible services right at your Airbnb, like private chefs, photography, catering, prepared meals, hairstyling, nail treatments, make-up, massages, personal training and spa treatments – each offered by experienced service hosts who have been vetted for quality. You can book thousands of professional services at nearly every price, all in one app, all over the world. Best of all, you don’t need to stay at an Airbnb or even be on a trip to get these services. Schedule a blow-dry, training session and more right at home.

GET A TRAVEL APP THAT TRAVELS WITH YOU
After you book a home, you’ll get personalised recommendations on the home page suggesting services and experiences for your trip, tailored to where you’re staying and who you’re travelling with. And the redesigned Profile gives you a snapshot of all the places you’ve been to on Airbnb and the people you’ve met along the way.

FIND ALL YOUR TRIP INFO IN ONE PLACE
Quickly find or share the details of your reservation – making it easier for everyone to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi with just a tap. Our in-app messaging means every guest on the trip can easily communicate with hosts to say hi, ask questions and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates. You can also share photos, videos and even customise an Airbnb Service, all in the same chat. And with a day-by-day view of everything you’ve booked in the updated Trips tab, it’s simple to keep track of your plans and get key details like check-in times, special instructions and entry codes all in one place, even when you’re offline.

WANT TO HOST? AIRBNB MAKES IT EASY.
Whether you want to host a home, experience or service, you can reach millions of people travelling and grow your business on Airbnb. List your home in a few simple steps. Or, you can apply to host an experience or service and once approved, you’re ready to welcome the world.

YOU’VE COME THIS FAR – NOW GO FURTHER
Stop reading and fire up the app to book yourself a one-of-a-kind trip on Airbnb.

Download the highest-rated travel app and join thousands of people finding hotel, motel and holiday home travel deals. Find a stay for your holiday, weekend getaway or business trip, anywhere in the world!

Search for hotels, motels & holiday homes

• 27 million hotels, holiday rentals, homes, apartments and other unique places to stay
• Search by city, attraction, landmark or hotel name with just one tap
• Filter by price, review score, amenities and other things important to you
• Find your last-minute stay or book far in advance

Find a great travel deal

• Daily deals for every budget
• Free cancellation on most rooms
• Browse over 135 million verified guest reviews

Manage your booking on the go

• Get paperless confirmation
• Make changes whenever, wherever
• 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages
• Contact your host, view check-in times and write reviews
• No booking or credit card fees

The Finnair app is a travel companion designed to give you peace of mind throughout your journey, from preparing for the flight to landing at the destination.

CHECK-IN AND BOARDING PASS

You can check in for your flights to most destinations, keep your boarding pass in the app and save it in your Wallet.

FLIGHT INFORMATION

You will be notified of boarding, delays, and other important moments during your journey. The app also easily stores your flight details, from baggage allowance to dietary restrictions, in one place.

UPGRADE YOUR EXPERIENCE

We offer Business Class upgrades, Premium Economy seats and other extra services through the app, so you can customise the flight to your needs. You can pay with Apple Pay, credit card, vouchers or Avios.

BOOK FLIGHTS

Discover new destinations and offers through the Finnair app and automatically add the flights to your app.

ACCESS FINNAIR PLUS

Keep an eye on your Avios, recent transactions and tier benefits. Adding the flight to the app while logged in ensures you get all the Avios you're entitled to. Remember to join Finnair Plus if you're not a member yet - or use the app anonymously if you wish.

CUSTOMER CARE

Get in touch with our customer care experts through the call centre or Facebook Messenger.

AIRPORT SERVICES

Reserve parking and check the terminal maps through the app. When you arrive to Helsinki-Vantaa airport, we'll let you know where to find your luggage.

We are continuously working on new features to support you during your travels.

With Waltti Mobile you can buy public transport tickets easily. When boarding a bus, show the Waltti Mobile ticket display to the card reader or the driver. The QR code and the remaining validity period are displayed on the ticket. You can buy multiple tickets at the same time.

The application also allows you to use the journey planner. The service shows your location and the nearest bus lines, stops, routes, and schedule information.


Waltti Mobile is available in the following cities:


Hämeenlinna
JOJO, Joensuu 
Linkki, Jyväskylä
Kajaani
Jonne&Minne, Kotka
Koutsi, Kouvola
Vilkku, Kuopio
Kymenlaakso
LSL, Lahti
Mikkeli
Oulu
Linkkari, Rovaniemi
Paikku, Salo
Lifti, Vaasa
Pori
Raasepori

Buy Nysse tickets quickly and easily! Includes a Nysse journey planner.

The Nysse Mobiili app makes it easy to buy single tickets, daily tickets or student season tickets for Tampere regional transport. Tickets are valid on buses, trams and trains throughout the Nysse area.

Tickets can be paid for with Visa, Visa Electron, Mastercard, MobilePay or mobile payment (phone bill).

Tickets purchased via the app are activated at the moment of purchase. Tickets must be validated with the ticket device each time you board, on each journey.

The ticket device is located at the entrance of the bus or tram. For train journeys, the ticket must be validated at the ticket device on the station platform before the journey begins. If you have bought more than one ticket, please confirm the code for each ticket separately.

You can use the app without registering.

By registering, you can also manage your usage data on new devices, for example if you change your phone. Your tickets and receipts will be saved and you can access them even if you change your device.

The app is free.

For more information about public transport in the Tampere region, visit nysse.fi

112 Suomi is the Emergency Response Centre Agency’s mobile app, which has been developed in cooperation with Finnish security-sector companies. The app is designed to help users find the right service quickly in emergencies and problem situations.

What are the benefits of the app?

Get help where it is needed in emergencies and problem situations
When you call the emergency services through the app, it automatically provides the Emergency Response Centre with your location information. 
Your location information is also provided to the Road Users’ Hotline and the Maritime Rescue Centre when you call them through the app. 

Help in different situations
The app includes hotlines for non-urgent situations. It also allows you to check the location of the nearest defibrillator and make a travel registration informing the Ministry of Foreign Affairs that you are travelling abroad.
In the instructions, you will find procedure cards for boaters in emergencies and problem situations, as well as a list of stroke symptoms. 

Avoid dangerous situations
The 112 Suomi mobile application is one of the statutory channels for public warnings. The app provides you with regional public safety alerts and notices based on the location of your phone. The public safety alerts are written and issued by the relevant authorities.

By using the app, you agree to the Terms and Conditions.
https://112.fi/en/112-suomi-terms-and-conditions

The 112 Suomi app’s data controller is the Emergency Response Centre Agency.

https://112.fi/en/privacy-statement-112-suomi-application

Read the 112 Suomi app’s Accessibility Statement on the Emergency Response Centre Agency website
https://112.fi/en/accessibility-statement-of-112-suomi-application

Find out more about the application on the Emergency Response Centre Agency website
https://112.fi/en/112-suomi-application

Developer
© Emergency Response Centre Agency

Fast and reliable taxi service 

Book the ride that’s best for you by comparing reliable taxi companies. Looking for the fastest ride? The most affordable? The most environmentally friendly? The best reviewed? 02 Taksi provides a comprehensive range of taxis and all of its rides are offset. You can also earn money for taxi rides by recommending the service to a friend! 

 
Here’s how to book a ride using 02 Taksi: 

1. Specify your pick-up address. If you also specify your destination, you will receive a fixed price for your ride, allowing you to see how much your ride is going to cost in advance. 

2. The app will give you different ride options based on the nearest available car, reviews and price. 

3. Choose the taxi that’s best for you and track its arrival on the map. 

4. Once your trip is over, review the ride and contribute to the quality of the service. 

 
The app also allows you to: 

Book a people-carrier for a bigger group 

Pre-book a taxi by specifying the pick-up time 

View your order history and active advance bookings 

Send receipts directly to your email or to accounting 


02 Taksi – We care more 

Caring is an important value for us. 

We care more about the environment: all emissions from 02 Taksi rides are offset. The application lets you find low-emission ride options easily. You can use our taxis with a clear conscience, leaving behind only green tyre tracks. 

We care more about you and our other customers: we offer you taxi money, which you can easily earn by recommending 02 Taksi to a friend. You’ll save in taxi expenses and your friend will travel with added comfort. 

We care about making things convenient for you: 02 Taksi brings together more than 40 taxi companies. We care about getting you where you need to be across Finland. We make booking a ride easy! 


02 Taksi is a transport service that brings together reliable taxi companies 

What was the number of that taxi company again? Where can I find a reliable ride? Remembering the phone numbers of different taxi companies can be difficult. There are also practically as many different taxi apps as there are companies in the field.  

Would you like to find several verifiably reliable taxi companies in one place? Do you like the idea of comparing rides and choosing, for instance, the cheapest option? 

All this – and more – is possible with 02 Taksi!  

Downloading the app takes only seconds and once installed, you’ll be able to see your local taxi companies and compare their rides by price, speed and reviews.  

If you specify your destination, you’ll be quoted a fixed price for your ride. This price won’t change later on, and you can track the arrival of your car on the map. 

02 Taksi only supplies rides from reputable taxi companies. Tens of thousands of bookings are made through the app each month! Give 02 Taksi a try and you’ll be amazed at how quick and easy it is to use. 

If you’re unable to find free rides via the application, you can order a taxi by calling the best telephone service in Finland on 020230. Our telephone service covers all of Finland. Call charges: €1.25 per call + €0.049 per second (+ local network rate / mobile charge). 
 

02 Taksi is everyone’s personal route planner! 

When your surroundings are unfamiliar or you need to get from one place to another quickly and conveniently, 02 Taksi is a great option for getting around – especially if the local route planner seems awkward, using public transport requires too many changes and you want to spend as little effort and time travelling as possible. 

By booking a taxi through 02 Taksi, you can travel directly from your point of departure to your destination. Enjoy your personal ride, which you yourself get to choose based on price, the fastest arrival time or the best reviews. 

 
Download the app, book a ride and travel with ease!

Find always the cheapest fuel nearby!

Tankille is a service for comparing the prices of gasoline, diesel and other fuel types. With the app, you can find the cheapest fuel nearby wherever you are. The app utilizes your location and shows you the best fuel prices in your neighborhood.

With the app, you can
- browse fuel stations in a map and in a list view
- search for stations using station name or city
- search stations along a route
- investigate station details such as address or station type
- mark stations as favorites
- sort the station list by price, distance or update time
- compare prices easy with red to green color coding
- launch navigation to a selected station
- report new fuel prices to the service
- upload and view images of stations

We are glad to help you out if you have any issues or feedback. You can reach us at info@tankille.fi.

Please visit our website, https://www.tankille.fi, for more information and tutorials.

Plan every getaway with ease as a friendly guide walks you from first idea to final packing check. Keep upcoming adventures organized, refreshed, and inspiring with helpful prompts waiting on your home dashboard. Build custom packing lists in seconds, track progress, and stay under luggage limits with smart reminders. Turn itinerary chaos into calm by grouping flights, stays, and activities in a clean, scrollable timeline. Swap currency amounts effortlessly, skim essential travel tips, and save emergency numbers for peace of mind. Let thoughtful suggestions adjust to your trip so you feel ready the moment departure day arrives.

TUI-sovellus tekee matkailusta helpompaa ja turvallisempaa. Kaikki lomaasi koskevat tiedot on kerätty samaan paikkaan – mobiililaitteessa käytettävään TUI-sovellukseen. Sovelluksen kautta voit olla yhteydessä TUIn oppaisiin vuorokauden ympäri sekä ennen lomaa että sen aikana. Sovelluksesta näet myös lentosi ja lentokenttäkuljetuksesi tiedot ja saat vinkkejä siitä, mitä voit lomakohteessa tehdä. Voit valita lukuisista kiinnostavista retkistä ja aktiviteeteista sekä lennoista ja hotelleista – ja tehdä varaukset suoraan matkasovelluksessa.

Tässä muutamia esimerkkejä sovelluksen toiminnoista:

- Ota yhteyttä oppaisiin vuorokauden ympäri – sekä ennen matkaa että sen aikana
- Valitse aktiviteeteista ja elämyksistä mieleisesi, ja varaa helposti sovelluksessa
- Katso lentoaikataulut ja varaamasi lentokenttäkuljetuksen tiedot
- Tarkista lennon lähtöportti ja matkalaukkuhihna
- Seuraa loman lähtölaskentaa ja lomakohteen säätietoja
- Vastaanota vinkkejä lomakohteesta loman suunnittelua varten
- Lue hotellitiedot, katso viikko-ohjelma ja varaa aktiviteetteja
- Tarkista tehtävä- ja pakkauslistalta ennen matkaa hoidettavat asiat
- Tee lähtöselvitys TUIn lennoille
- Tilaa tax-free-ostokset ja varaa lisäpalveluita 
- Etsi loma laajasta matka-, lento ja hotellivalikoimasta, varaa matka ja maksa sovelluksen kautta 

Ota yhteyttä TUI-oppaisiin ympäri vuorokauden
TUI-sovelluksen kautta voit olla yhteydessä oppaisiin ympäri vuorokauden, kaikkina viikon päivinä. Lähetät kysymyksesi sovelluksen Kysy oppailta -osiossa ja saat vastauksen nopeasti. Ja oppaat tavoitat sovelluksen kautta jo suunnitteluvaiheessa – matkan varaamista seuraavasta päivästä alkaen. Sovellukseen saat myös viestejä, niin hyviä lomavinkkejä kuin tietoja tärkeistä asioista matkan aikana. 

Varaa TUIn aktiviteetteja ja elämyksiä
Koe lomallasi enemmän, osallistumalla lomakohteessa tehtäviin aktiviteetteihin ja retkiin. Valitse lukuisien elämysten joukosta omasi ja tee varaus suoraan sovelluksessa. Sieltä tarkistat myös tarkat noutoajat ja -paikat. 

Lentokenttäkuljetuksen tiedot
Jos olet varannut bussikuljetuksen, näet sovelluksesta bussin numeron ja noutopaikan. Kotiinpaluun lähestyessä saat myös viestillä tiedot lentokenttäkuljetuksen noutoajasta ja -paikasta. 

Inspiraatiota ja lomasuunnittelua
Sovelluksessa voit seurata lomasi lähtölaskentaa. Voit myös seurata lomakohteesi sääennusteita. Lisäksi löydät tietoja lomakohteesi nähtävyyksistä, rannoista, ostoksista ja ravintoloista. 

Varaa lisäpalveluita
Lomasovelluksemme kautta voit tehdä tax-free-ostoksia sekä varata istumapaikan, lisää jalkatilaa tai matkatavarapainoa. (Koskee vain tiettyjä lentoja).

Etsi ja varaa matka
TUIn matkavalikoimassamme on satoja matkakohteita ympäri maailman – Thaimaan ja Kanariansaarten rannoista suurkaupunkeihin, kuten Rooma ja Barcelona. Voit varata matkapaketteja, lentoja, hotelleja, retkiä, aktiviteetteja ja lippuja suoraan TUI-sovelluksen kautta. 

Lisää varauksesi sovellukseen
Kun olet varannut matkan, voit helposti lisätä varauksesi sovellukseen. Syötät vain varausnumerosi sekä matkavarauksellesi antamasi puhelinnumeron tai sähköpostiosoitteen sovelluksessa. 

TUI-sovelluksen käyttö on mahdollista useimmilla lomillamme, mutta joillain lomatyypeillä sovelluksen käyttö ei ole mahdollista, tämä koskee pelkkiä yhdensuuntaisia lentoja ja risteilyjä. Jos olet varannut pelkän hotellin, voit lisätä varauksesi sovellukseen ja nähdä hotellisi tiedot, mutta muut sovelluksen toiminnot eivät toistaiseksi ole käytettävissä.

Smooth sailing with the app

The Viking Line app is helpful before, during, and after the trip. Start by booking your next trip and get all the information about it in the app. 
Welcome aboard Viking Line’s ships! 
 
The application enables you to:  
- Easily book your next trip.
- Keep track of your booking details by signing up with your Viking Line Club membership number or booking number.
- Use the Viking Line Club card digitally, collect Boats, and take advantage of club offers as easily as with the physical card.
- Check your Boat balance, level period, and level status.
- See the departure and arrival times for your booking using the travel schedule.
- Skip the queues! With the app, you can easily check-in, print out your cabin card and booking card using our self-service check-in kiosks in the terminal. 
- Stay updated about showtimes on board.
- Browse the onboard shop selection and get information about special offers.
- Get detailed information about services and opening hours on board.
- Do your beverage shopping in advance (Pre-order)
- Get digital boarding cards for all ships and departures.
- Use your phone as a cabin door key on departures on Viking Glory and Viking XPRS. 

The app asks for permission to use the Location services. Your permission is needed for the app to function as your cabin door key.
The app will not be able to open your cabin door lock if you do not give permission for the usage of Location services. You will, however, be able to use other functions of the app normally.

Use the Trips and Tickets app to search for and plan your entire journey from one address to another. The app will guide you to your destination using various modes of transport, giving you the freedom to choose the schedule, means of transport and routes that suit you best.

The app will also tell you which tickets you need and you can conveniently buy all the tickets for your journey in one go. The app is constantly updated with new features, modes of travel and local transport tickets for various cities!

The Trips and Tickets app allows you to:
- Keep all your tickets in one place. You no longer need a separate travel card!
- Buy tickets directly from the app anywhere, anytime. The ticket shop in the app is open 24/7.

- Check your ticket information, validity periods and remaining trips in the app.
- Conveniently show your ticket to an inspector using the QR code on the app’s home page.

Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Install an eSIM and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity.

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and functions like a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan for your travel destination.
3. Install the eSIM.
4. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet upon arrival.

Available for 200+ countries and regions, including: 
- United States
- United Kingdom
- Turkey
- Italy
- France
- Spain
- Japan
- Germany
- Canada
- Thailand
- Portugal
- Morocco
- Colombia
- India
- South Africa

Why Airalo?
- Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
- Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
- Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
- Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
- Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
- Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
- 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
- No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
- Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
- Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.


eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim 

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–
